title: Islam, meet Mr. Enlightenment. Moderns, Meet Mr. Francis, the Lover. Awash in Historiography
summary: Paul discusses the intersection of Islam and Christianity through the lens of historiography, drawing parallels between the origins of Islam and Christian tradition. He highlights the importance of understanding figures like St. Francis as lovers rather than just saints or philosophers. His analysis emphasizes the role of love in both religion and human experience as a driving force for understanding complex historical figures.
